name: spec-as-code
description: Hackathon project for spec-as-code with PM spec, agent, and product marketing site

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:pm-spec" "npm run dev:agent" "npm run dev:marketing"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:pm-spec && npm run build:agent && npm run build:marketing
scripts.test:all: npm run test:pm-spec && npm run test:agent && npm run test:marketing
scripts.install:packages: cd packages/pm-spec && npm install && cd ../agent && npm install && cd ../marketing-site && npm install
